mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_award (award_name, award_desc, award_img, POINT, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, shop_id) VALUES (#{awardName}, #{awardDesc}, #{awardImg}, #{point}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{shopId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_award WHERE award_id = #{awardId} AND shop_id = #{shopId}
mapper.select: SELECT award_id, award_name, award_desc, award_img, point, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, shop_id FROM tb_award WHERE award_id = #{awardId}
